Files created at: V:\work\Blender\uno\uno_project

To run:
  1. cd V:\work\Blender\uno\uno_project
  2. npm install   # created automatically by the Blender script if npm was available
  3. npm run dev   # start frontend

The frontend reads SERVER URL from VITE_SERVER_URL (.env.local).
